title: Superelastic hydrogel electrolyte incorporating helical protein molecules as zinc ion transport pathways to enhance cycling stability of zinc metal batteries

Flexible zinc metal batteries are one of the most promising candidates for future energy storage devices, howbeit their performance is hampered by current hydrogel electrolyte of low ionic conductivity and...
